description:
BCAP is the first digital Venture Capital fund raised in an ICO format. The ICO raised $10 million in 6 hours.

Blockchain Capital is a San Francisco-based VC focused on blockchain companies. Some of its portfolio companies include Coinbase, Abra, Bitfury, BitGo, Blockcypher, Blockstream, Ripple, BTCC, Chain, Kraken, Civic, Stampery, Tierion, Xapo and Shapeshift.

Blockchain Capital is founded by Brock Pierce, Bart Stephens and Brad Stephens.
name: BCAP
